comments.author: oleg.kalnichevski@bearingpoint.com
comments.body:
Policy driven cookie management has been implemented. 

The following cookie specifications are currently supported:
- Compatibility (greater compatibility cookie management of popular web browsers
- Netscape Cookie Draft
- RFC 2109

comments.author: oleg.kalnichevski@bearingpoint.com
comments.body: *** HTTPCLIENT-31 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

description:
Some user configurable how cookies are handled.  Emulate cookie options in web
browsers.
